## Arrangement enum

Ways to arrange a set of child objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare enum Arrangement 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Auto | <code>0</code> | Guess the best arrangement based on object count and dimensions. |
|  Linear | <code>1</code> | Put all the objects in a line on the x-axis. |
|  Radial | <code>3</code> | Put the N objects around the edges of an N-sided polygon. |
|  Rectangular | <code>2</code> | Put the objects around the edges of a rectangle. |
